result.arabic_text: يَٰنِسَآءَ ٱلنَّبِيِّ مَن يَأۡتِ مِنكُنَّ بِفَٰحِشَةٖ مُّبَيِّنَةٖ يُضَٰعَفۡ لَهَا ٱلۡعَذَابُ ضِعۡفَيۡنِۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٗا
result.translation: Yemwe bagore b’Umuhanuzi (Muhamadi)! Muri mwe uzakora icyaha cy’urukozasoni mu buryo bugaragara, ibihano bye bizikuba kabiri, kandi ibyo kuri Allah biroroshye.
